created_at.description: Either the `created_at` filter or the `register_at` filter is required for creating a report.

date_from.description: Date string in ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD). Only shipments created at >= this date will be in the report.

date_to.description: Date string in ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD). Only shipments created at <= this date will be in the response.

register_at.description: Either the `created_at` filter or the `register_at` filter is required for creating a report.

date_from.description: Date string in ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD). Only shipments registered at >= this date will be in the report.

date_to.description: Date string in ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD). Only shipments registered at <= this date will be in the response.

search.description:
String of characters you want to look for in shipment attributes. Available fields to look in are:
  • `date_created` (YYYY-MM-DD). Deprecated use `filter[created_at][date_from]` or `filter[created_at][date_to]` instead.
  • `description`
  • `customer_reference`
  • `recipient_address`
  • `tracking_code`

description.description: Filter shipments by their description attribute. This is a strict search, meaning that only if the search string matches the `description` attribute of a shipment completely, will the shipment be included.

customer_reference.description: Filter shipments by their customer reference attribute. This is a strict search, meaning that only if the search string matches the `customer_reference` attribute of a shipment completely, will the shipment be included.

shops.description: Array of shop ids to filter included shipments by.

organizations.description: Array of organization ids to filter included shipments by.

carriers.description: Array of carrier ids to filter included shipments by.

current_status_code.description: Comma separated string of status codes to filter by. Only shipments with the a current status that corresponds with one of the status codes will be in the report.

service_code.description: Comma separated string of service codes to filter by. Only shipments with a service that corresponds with one of the service codes will be in the report.
